opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 21st day of March, 2013, the Application for Post-Submission Communication is hereby GRANTED. The Petition for Allowance of Appeal is DENIED.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

March 21, 2013.
